faq.Question: When will the resume verification of 4th Years take place?
faq.Answer:
Just after the Internship Drive -May be 1st week od Sept, by that time you can update the CV with Internships done. 
 This will be done by managers for their departments under my supervision.

faq.Question: Can I remove Key Courses Taken Section from my Resume
faq.Answer: Yes, it's not mandatory but if you have taken some good courses online or somewhere it'll add a good value to your resume

faq.Question: What if the internship completion certificate is not available by the time CV verification happens? Will the offer letter work in that case?
faq.Answer: NO. Completion certificate /email is must to write in CV

faq.Question:
What we have to do if we want to change our CV after verification 
 ( like after a month or so, if we want to add something)
faq.Answer: NO. Completion certificate /email is must to write in CV

faq.Question: I am currently doing an internship which will be over on 4th August! So will receive the completion certificate after that. Can I use the offer letter during verification instead of the CoC?
faq.Answer: NO. Completion certificate /email is a must to write in CV. becuase we will be unsure of sucessful completion.

faq.Question: Can I add something if i had missed in my resume after verification is done?
